headline: NRG’s President of Consumer Rasesh Patel to Retire
summary: NRG Energy anticipates naming a successor during the second quarter. Patel will remain in an advisory role during the transition.

raw.headline: NRG’s President of Consumer Rasesh Patel to Retire

headline: NRG Energy Announces Executive Leadership Change
summary: HOUSTON, April 07, 2025--NRG Energy Inc. (NYSE:NRG) today announced that Rasesh Patel, President, NRG Consumer, has decided to retire, effective May 19, 2025. Afterward, Mr. Patel will remain available in an advisory role to ensure a seamless transition. The Company anticipates naming a successor during the second quarter.

raw.headline: NRG Energy Announces Executive Leadership Change
raw.summary: HOUSTON, April 07, 2025--NRG Energy Inc. (NYSE:NRG) today announced that Rasesh Patel, President, NRG Consumer, has decided to retire, effective May 19, 2025. Afterward, Mr. Patel will remain available in an advisory role to ensure a seamless transition. The Company anticipates naming a successor during the second quarter.
